bl.tools
Class Cleaner

java.lang.Object
  bl.tools.Cleaner

public class Cleaner
extends java.lang.Object

Tool to remove/rename tests, that can not be definitely be associated with a bug (those which fail but are not mentioned in iBUGS`s repository.xml) in the directory where the serialized graphs stored.

Author:
Christopher Oßner

           change to true if failed tests, that are not bound to the bug should be deleted

subtractLists

private java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> subtractLists(java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> subtractor,
                                                          java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> subtrahend)
                                                   throws java.lang.RuntimeException
Helper to subtract two HashSets from each other.

Parameters:
subtractor - Set to subtract from
subtrahend - Set to subtract
Returns:
subtractor - subtrahend
Throws:
RuntimeException, - if subtrahend is not contained in subtractor
java.lang.RuntimeException

processSerializedAdjacenceLists

private void processSerializedAdjacenceLists(java.lang.String location,
                                             java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> changeList,
                                             java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> testsForFix,
                                             boolean deleteFailed)
Clean up is done here.

Parameters:
location - directory of the serialized graphs
changeList - tests to rename/remove
testsForFix - will be renamed to name + '_failed'
deleteFailed - if set to true, graphs in changeList will be removed, otherwise renamed to name + '_xxx'
